item.title: R to @thedoh: thank you! it took over a month of growth for me to feel like I wasn't being gaslit

item.title:
R to @thedoh: I don't name them, oddly enough
I call them the babies/boys
item.dc:creator: @alicegoldfuss
item.description:
I don't name them, oddly enough

I call them the babies/boys

item.title:
R to @alicegoldfuss: Anywho, I'm still kicking
I'm just writing instead of rage tweeting. My fitness tracker is pleased with my resting heart rate these days.
Don't forget to find joy where you can...otherwise what is the point
item.dc:creator: @alicegoldfuss
item.description:
Anywho, I'm still kicking

I'm just writing instead of rage tweeting. My fitness tracker is pleased with my resting heart rate these days.

Don't forget to find joy where you can...otherwise what is the point

item.title: R to @alicegoldfuss: I've definitely gone to bed late one or two nights because I was standing in my kitchen cooing over this theater kid plant
item.dc:creator: @alicegoldfuss
item.description: I've definitely gone to bed late one or two nights because I was standing in my kitchen cooing over this theater kid plant

item.title:
R to @alicegoldfuss: Also it kept growing after it opened, which my other nepenthes doesn't do
It grew another half inch (currently 4 inches tall) and the peristome continued changing
item.dc:creator: @alicegoldfuss
item.description:
Also it kept growing after it opened, which my other nepenthes doesn't do

It grew another half inch (currently 4 inches tall) and the peristome continued changing

item.title:
R to @alicegoldfuss: This cutting is from a mature vine, which means it grows upper pitchers!
I don't know if it will form another offshoot and make bottom pitchers as well, but this upper does have a gothic flair I quite enjoy
item.dc:creator: @alicegoldfuss
item.description:
This cutting is from a mature vine, which means it grows upper pitchers!

I don't know if it will form another offshoot and make bottom pitchers as well, but this upper does have a gothic flair I quite enjoy

item.title:
R to @alicegoldfuss: I tried different sunlight levels, humidity, water sources, and watering methods
It started growing the pitcher in March
It took 3 days for the fully-grown pitcher to open
Incredible drama queen
item.dc:creator: @alicegoldfuss
item.description:
I tried different sunlight levels, humidity, water sources, and watering methods

It started growing the pitcher in March

It took 3 days for the fully-grown pitcher to open

Incredible drama queen

item.title:
I hit a word count milestone, so I get to post a treat
After over 2 years of trying, I finally got my nepenthes gothica to pitcher

item.title: RT by @alicegoldfuss: To be clearer: your app data is not private. if your menstruation pattern is disrupted, and an app knows about it, prosecutors can use that as evidence against you in court
item.dc:creator: @sylviaviridian
item.description:
